content: **orna-mitts** is a collection of 11 ball ornaments based on the mitten designs i published in 2023 1 the ornament is an ideal project for last minute gifts that can be made with yarn leftovers from bigger projects **erratum ** **ornament # 11** is missing an **m** make 1 symbol in round 13 stitches 2 16 18 32 34 48 50 and 64 **materials** us size 1 2 5mm set of 5 dpns tapestry needle any fingering or light fingering yarn for one ornament about 50-55 yards 46-50m polyfill stuffing polyester fiber fill **gauge** 8 stitches x 10 row knitting in the round in 1 x 1 after blocking exact gauge is not important **notes** 1 *size * with recommended yarn needles and gauge the ornament will be about 9 ½ 24 cm in circumference after stuffing larger needles and thicker yarn will produce a larger ornament 2 *stranded colorwork * follow the charts from right to left catch longer float using preferred method catching floats is not essential for this project but it will help maintain the gauge make sure to secure any loose yarn ends inside the ornament weaving in the ends is not needed big **thank you** to my wonderful testers who made these lovely ornaments for me ♥ heli-keiju ♥ jenturm ♥ mibyrd ♥july65 ♥ knittintheblues ♥ juliemross ♥bgow ♥ zwulli ♥ micleburger 1 https //www ravelry com/bundles/mittens-and-mitts-2023
